meanings.definition: A disc on which video material is stored.
meanings.sent1: I watched a movie on a videodisc last night.
meanings.sent2: The videodisc contained all the episodes of my favorite TV show.
meanings.sent3: My cat mistook the videodisc for a toy and tried to play with it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a videodisc, storing memories of all the places she had visited.
meanings.sent5: The videodisc gleamed in the sunlight, promising hours of entertainment.

meanings.definition: To record or reproduce video material on a disc.
meanings.sent1: I need to videodisc our family vacation for future memories.
meanings.sent2: He videodiscs all his lectures to help students study at home.
meanings.sent3: The robot videodiscs every moment of its existence, hoping to understand emotions.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter videodiscs in my mind, replaying the joyous moment endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The camera videodiscs the beauty of nature, capturing every detail with precision.
